critical_rules.description: Using scalar function on column in WHERE clause prevents index usage (non-SARGable). Move function to the right side or refactor query.
critical_rules.target: YEAR(), MONTH(), CONVERT(), CAST(), ISNULL() on columns in WHERE

critical_rules.description: Excessive subquery nesting (more than 2 levels). Refactor using CTEs, temporary tables, or JOINs for better performance.
critical_rules.target: Nested SELECT statements, subqueries in WHERE/FROM

critical_rules.description: Inefficient use of IN clause with subquery returning large dataset. Consider using EXISTS or JOIN instead.

warning_rules.description: Using SELECT * instead of explicit column list. Specify required columns for better performance and maintainability.
Hard-coded values detected. Use parameters or variables for maintainability.
warning_rules.target: String literals, numeric literals in queries

warning_rules.description: Unused variable or parameter. Remove unused declarations.
Missing prefix for variables/tables. Use @ for variables, # for temp tables, standard naming conventions.
